title: 后台添加travel失败

title: ts-travel2-service & ts-order-other-service & ts-preserve-other-service reconstruction
body:
This pull request is for issue #71, #72 and #73, we have made some modification to the implementation of the three services(travel2, order-other, preserve-other) which includes:
1. reconstructed the java files for code smells scanned by SonarQube and p3c. 
2. added Junit test cases for almost every class.
3. fixed some bugs such as using "equals()" to compare two strings rather than "==".

title: ts-travel-service-modify-2
body: Solved issues raised in #89.

title: Ts preserve service modify 2
body: Solved problems raised in #88.

title: ts-order-service-modify-4
body: Solved the issue mentioned in #87.

title: ts-travel-service reconstruct
body:
<!--
Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests 
-->

### What would you like to be added

1. In "src/main/java/travel/service/TravelServiceImpl.java",  `TravelServicelmpI.getTickets()` contains an if/else block that would always do the same thing regardless of the condition considered.
```
if (queryForStationId(startingPlaceName, headers).equals(trip.getStartingStationId()) 
    queryForStationId(endPlaceName, headers).equals(trip.getTerminalStationId())) {
    response.setConfortClass(50);
    response.setEconomyClass(50);
} else {
    response.setConfortClass(50);
    response.setEconomyClass(50);
}

```

2. In "src/main/java/travel/entity/Type.java", setters should be removed.

### Why is this needed

1. In my opinion, there are at least two possibilities, one is there are some different actions you would add in the future, another is the condition is useless. For the first possibility, that's all right. But for the second possibility, it might cause inconsistency error if carelessly dealt with.

2. Mentioned in #88

### Additional context

1. Nothing

title: ts-preserve-service reconstruct
body:
<!--
Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests 
-->

### What would you like to be added

1. In "src/main/java/preserve/entity/Contacts.java", class `Contacts` needs a `hashCode()` method.

2. In "src/main/java/preserve/entity/Order.java", class `Order` needs a `hashCode()` method.

3. In "src/main/java/preserve/entity/Account.java",  the constructor of `Account` used a string containing 'password', which should be replaced by meaningless string.

4. In "src/main/java/preserve/entity/AssuranceType.java" and "src/main/java/preserve/entity/Type.java", all of the setters in class `AssuranceType` and `Type` should be removed.

### Why is this needed

1. Mentioned in #87.

2. Mentioned in #87.

3. People could easily extract the original string value from compiled files. A string containing 'password' could help people understand some part of the code.

4. Enum are generally thought of as constant. A setter for constant is paradoxical. 

### Additional context

1. Nothing

title: ts-order-service reconstruct
body:
<!--
Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests 
-->

### What would you like to be added

1. In src/main/java/order/entity/Order.java, a `hashCode()` is required for class `Order` since this class overrides `equals()`.

### Why is this needed

1. `hashCode()` would be called when using something like `HashSet`, which needs to judge if two objects are the same. If you want the judging process runs just like you're using `equals()`, you'd better override `hashCode()`. 

### Additional context

1. Bugs were found using sornarqube + p3c plugin, as a supplement to previous issue.

2. There is one-to-one match between What and Why.

3. I haven't seen this template earlier : (

title: ts-ticket-office-service-reconstruct
body:
this commit fixes #85
We fixed the problems mentioned in the issue #85 
And add test cases, too.

title: ts-ticket-office-service reconstruct & junit test
body:
<!--
Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests 
-->

### What would you like to be added

1.fix one smell in db.js
2.invoke callback in the error handling module in each collection operation function before return in db.js

### Why is this needed

1."err" hides or potentially hides a variable declared in an outer scope at line 16, so we changed the error variable's name in the inner scope to 'err2'
2. When test, we found that the asynchronous call like 'collection.find().toArray(function(err, result)' will not end normally when the variable 'err' is not null, in other words when the functions come to the error handling branch, timeout will occur. Add callback before return cuold solve this problem.

### Additional context

add some test cases to cover all branches in db.js and almost all branches in app.js and router.js.
In the final submitted version, we removed all security breaches and smells, and achieved the unit test coverage of 98.4%.

title: ts-ticketinfo-service-reconstruct
body:
This commit fixes #83 
We fixed the problems mentioned in the issue #83 
And add test cases, too.

title: ts-ticketinfo-service reconstruct & junit test
body:
<!--
Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests 
-->

### What would you like to be added

1.Modification to TravelResult.java

2.Modification to Trip.java 

3.Modification to TripId.java

4.Modification to Type.java

5.Modification to TicketInfoServiceImpl.java


### Why is this needed


1. The return type of this method should be an interface such as "Map" rather than the implementation "HashMap".

2. 
"startingStationId" is marked "javax.validation.constraints.NotNull" but is not initialized in this constructor.
"trainTypeId" is marked "javax.validation.constraints.NotNull" but is not initialized in this constructor.

3.
This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.
Rename "type" which hides the field declared at line 7.

4. Lower the visibility of this setter or remove it altogether.

5. Immediately return this expression instead of assigning it to the temporary variable "idResponse".


### Additional context

We simulated the database using Mock, wrote unit tests using JUnit, calculated unit test coverage using JaCoCo, and connected to SonarQube by modifying pom.xml.
In the final submitted version, we removed all security breaches and smells, and achieved the unit test coverage of 90.0%.

title: ts-train-service reconstruct & junit test
body:
### What would you like to be added

1.Modification to TrainApplication.java

2.Modification to SecurityConfig.java

3.Modification to TrainController.java

4.Add a Java class named TrainTypeDTO.java

5.Modification to InitData.java

6.Modification to TrainTypeRepository.java

7.Modification to TrainServiceImpl.java


### Why is this needed

1. Remove the declaration of thrown exception 'java.lang.Exception', as it cannot be thrown from method's body.

2. Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "ADMIN" 3 times.

3. 
Remove this unused import 'org.springframework.http.HttpStatus'.
Remove this unused import 'org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity'.
This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.
Use isEmpty() to check whether the collection is empty or not.

4. Replace this persistent entity with a simple POJO or DTO object.

5. 2 duplicated blocks of code must be removed.

6. This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.

7.  This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.


### Additional context

We simulated the database using Mock, wrote unit tests using JUnit, calculated unit test coverage using JaCoCo, and connected to SonarQube by modifying pom.xml.
In the final submitted version, we removed all security breaches and smells, and achieved the unit test coverage of 86.9%.

Please use this template for submitting enhancement requests

2. System.out.println should be replaced to Logger.

    `Order.java`

    `Order.java` `Contacts.java`

title: ts-order-other-service reconstruct & junit test
body:
### What would you like to be added
1. Modification to SecurityConfig.java 
2. Modification to OrderOtherController.java
3. Modification to LeftTickertInfo.java
4. Modification to Order.java
5. Modification to OrderAlterInfo.java
6. Modification to OrderSecurity.java
7. Modification to OrderStatus.java
8. Modification to QueryInfo.java
9. Modification to Seat.java
10. Modification to SeatClass.java
11. Modification to SoldTicket.java
12. Modification to Ticket.java
13. Modification toTrainType.java
14. Modification to InitData.java
15. Modification to OrderOtherRepository.java
16. Modification to OrderOtherService.java
17. Modification to OrderOtherServiceImpl.java
18. Modification to OrderOtherApplication.java

### Why is this needed
#### Sonarlint error
1. 重复的字符串，专门设置一个变量，这个变量的值为该字符串

    `SecurityConfig.java` `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

2. System.out.println error，改成logger.log，以日志方式记录

    `OrderOtherController.java` `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

3. 没有用到的import删除

    `OrderOtherController.java`

4. 方法写的过于复杂，嵌套过多，需要重构

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

5. 注释掉的代码段可以被删除

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

6. 用is_empty来检测是否empty

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

7. Local variables should not be declared and then immediately returned or thrown 

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`
#### P3c error
1. 类要添加创建者信息@author

    `SecurityConfig.java` `OrderOtherController.java` `InitData.java` `OrderOtherRepository.java` `OrderOtherService.java` 

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

2. 注释要按javadoc的方式

    `SecurityConfig.java`

3. 接口方法必须使用注释

    `OrderOtherRepository.java` `OrderOtherService.java` 

4. 重写equal和hascode

    `OrderOtherServiceImpl.java`

### Additional context

title: ts-travel2-service reconstruct & junit test
body:
### What would you like to be added
1. Modification to SecurityConfig.java 
2. Modification to Travel2Controller.java
3. Modification to AdminTrip.java
4. Modification to Route.java
5. Modification to Seat.java
6. Modification to SoldTicket.java
7. Modification to TrainType.java
8. Modification to SeatClass.java
9. Modification to Travel.java
10. Modification to TravelInfo.java
11. Modification to TravelResult.java
12. Modification to Trip.java
13. Modification to TripAllDetail.java
14. Modification to TripAllDetailInfo.java
15. Modification to TripId.java
16. Modification to TripInfo.java
17. Modification to TripResponse.java
18. Modification to Type.java
19. Modification to InitData.java
20. Modification to TripRepository.java
21. Modification to Travel2Service.java
22. Modification to TravelToServiceImpl.java
23. Modification to Travel2Application.java
24. Create TravelBase.java
25. Create TripBase.java
26. Junit test case for the functions provided in ts-travel2-service.
27. Support for sonarqube and sonar-scanner.
### Why is this needed
1. 重复代码块需要简化，比如封装成方法，以实现相同的功能

    `InitData.java`

2. 功能属性相同的entity类中的相同功能的方法的声明，应该提升到抽象类或基类中

    `Trip.java ` `TravelInfo.java` `Travel.java`  `TripInfo.java`

3. 在if/else/for/while/do语句中必须使用大括号，即使只有一行代码，避免使用下面的形式：if (condition) statements; 

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`  

4. 不应该在String对象上的"toString()" 方法

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`  

5. 可能存在Null pointers时，不应该不判断是否为null前，直接调用对象的方法

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`  

6. System.out.println should be replaced to Logger

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`  etc.

7. 不能使用过时的类或方法，如new Date(String str)

    `InitData.java`

8. 所有的枚举类型字段必须要有注释，说明每个数据项的用途 

    `SeatClass.java`

9. 方法名、参数名、成员变量、局部变量都统一使用lowerCamelCase，必须遵从驼峰形式 

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`

10. 单个方法的总行数不超过80行，应该拆分成多个逻辑单元更小的方法

    `Travel2ServiceImpl.java`

11. 所有的抽象方法（包括接口中的方法）必须要用javadoc注释、除了返回值、参数、异常说明外，还必须指出该方法做什么事情，实现什么功能 

    `Travel2Service.java` `TripRepository.java`

12. 所有的类都必须添加创建者信息 

    `AdminTrip.java` `InitData.java` etc.

13. 应该及时清理不再使用的代码段或配置信息 

    `Travel2Controller.java`

14. 所有的覆写方法，必须加@Override注解

    `TripRepository.java` etc.

15. 类、类属性、类方法的注释必须使用javadoc规范，使用/**内容*/格式，不得使用//xxx方式和/*xxx*/方式 

    `SecurityConfig .java`  `Travel2Controller.java`

16. 方法内部单行注释，在被注释语句上方另起一行，使用//注释。方法内部多行注释使用/* */注释。注意与代码对齐 

    `TripResponse.java `

17. 添加sonarqube 和 sonar-scanner，扫描代码缺陷

18. 添加Junit单元测试

### Additional context

title: ts-payment-service reconstruct & junit test
